care of=
 you in a moment.

He stops sending the panic attack at Animus, and instead=
 concentrates
on his own mechanical processes. By the same way his armor re=
pairs
itself, he starts consciously "repairing" the spheres, trying to
pers=
uade them that they are a part of him, that they are him. The
energy drain =
is high, but he still has enough power to do something.

Azureblade: See yo=
u in hell.

He aims and shoots two missile at point blank range at Animus.
